Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the use of the same picture with different headlines as an example of media deception.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the use of the same picture with different headlines is deceitful.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the use of the same picture with different headlines indicates deceitful behavior by the media.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that the use of the same picture with different headlines may be a result of different topics being addressed in the linked blog post.
